channel.title: Blue Squirrel Inc
channel.description:
[b]Blue Squirrel Inc.[/b] Is recruiting team members to join a nice friendly team to code projects with, The current project we are recruiting for is CyberScape. A runescape Private Server
More Details -
- Must be quite active in helping when there are things to do - There Will be 1 - 3 week breaks in between each project - must be dedicated to at least 1 hours of work when applicable
[b]PHP Overview : -[/b] You will be working with another PHP coder creating the websites PHP, You will be required to have a fairly strong grasp on the language itself. You will be creating all the PHP aspects of the website like Feedback forms, password recovery, create account etc.
[b]PHP:[/b] [Parad0x_]
[SPOT TWO]
[b]SQL Overview : -[/b] You will be working with another SQL coder creating the databases the website needs. You will be required to do most things in a database linking to the PHP scripts to save accounts etc. You will be creating, Hi-Scores, Message centre and forums etc.
[b]SQL:[/b] [Parad0x_]
[SPOT TWO]
[b]HTML Overview : -[/b] You will be working with another html coder creating the website how it looks and How it should Function. You will be required to have a very good understanding of HTML creating links, pictures etc. You will be creating the server website (with the help of a java coder putting webclient in) and also creating the teams website.
[b]HTML:[/b] [SPOT ONE]
[SPOT TWO]
[b]All Spots : -[/b] will recieve admin status on the server and older versions of the games Source to make your own server from.
please post here if you wish to make an application of course more people Is nicer but those are the spots we want to fill mainly.
If anyone notices that I have got anything wrong in the overview like HTML doesnt put in webclient its PHP etc. then please post here those errors too :)

projects with, The current project we are recruiting for is CyberScape. A runescape Private Server

  • There Will be 1 - 3 week breaks in between each project
